frame.name: Cutting
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> cuts a <fen>Item</fen> into <fen>Pieces</fen> using an <fen>Instrument</fen> (which may or may not be expressed).
<ex>At the ceremony, <fex name="Agent">the CEO</fex> <t>cut</t> <fex name="Item">the red ribbon hanging across the main entrance</fex> <fex name="Pieces">into a glorious confetti</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person cutting the <fen>Item</fen> into <fen>Pieces</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Instrument</fen> with which the <fen>Item</fen> is being cut into <fen>Pieces</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Item</fen> is being sliced into <fen>Pieces</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act of the <fen>Agent</fen> that accomplishes the slicing. <ex>I <t>sliced</t> the cucumber in 1/8th inch slices <fex name="Mns">by marking intervals with a ruler</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Item
FE.definition: <def-root>The item which is being cut into <fen>Pieces</fen>. <ex>People back then had to <t>chop</t> <fex name="Item">firewood</fex> all day long.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Item</fen> is being cut into <fen>Pieces</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Pieces
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Pieces</fen> are the parts of the original <fen>Item</fen> which are the result of the slicing.</def-root>
